reviews.review:
Très bon FPS compétitif ! 

Je recommande ce jeu a 100% surtout pour : La compétition , le train de l'aim et le fun entres amis 
Je déconseille ce jeu car : Il y 'a beaucoup de triche

Me gusta, es un buen juego.
I like it, Good game.
Якби не чітери то гра була б супер
Большая просьба - не играйте в этот кал - жизнь у вас одна - вьеби говна

The real OG FPS title. No other shooter comes close to this bad boy. No wonder the game has been on the top for over 2 decades. Games come and go but CS stays. After playing Valorant (hope you are familiar with the name), I understood how better CS is. Although CSGO is not so enjoyable at start but once you grind your way up you will get the kick. Most fun you can have with your friends. Don't forget to buy the prime upgrade to get a better and fair gaming experience (Just ignore the toxic players and don't forget to report the cheaters).
le bruit d'un zeus ça n'a pas de prix
its more realistic than CS Condition zero

Great game overall. Balanced,good community and for the bigger challenge faceit is always there. Good game also for beginners. The ranking system is well done. I do recommend Prime Status else you will have too many hackers.
L4vn
sacma sapan bı oyun rusca ogrenmenız ıcın bırebır
Gra świetna, klasyka gatunku, fajnie jakby zostały wprowadzone lepsze systemy antycheat

Juego : Mitico juego, recomendado
Comunidad: Algunos jugadores son muy toxicos, se lo toman muy enserio y es un simple juego no es la vida real.
Hackers: Demasiados
Velmi dobrá fps hra, akorát potřebuješ dobrej aim
El mejor juego que tiene Steam. No hay más.

儿时回忆，1000个小时才是开始

The game is just awesome! All the maps and their details are on the next level. The guns spray patterns, damage and their sound seems so realistic. If you're playing with your friends then you're just gonna love it!!
Если у вас нон-прайм то удалите эту игру

Хорошая игра,но много читеров :(

Yılların unutulmaz oyunu CS üzerinde ne gibi bir inceleme yapmamızı istiyorlar ki MUHTEŞEM bir oyun kalitesini yıllardır aktif oyuncusu ile göstermeye devam ediyor.
fun game to play with your gay friend

Jut the right balance between fun and competative play. It hits the sweetspot by having casual for begginners and all the other options for afvanced players. I play cs since the early versions and it comes very close to 1.6 :).
bu oyun güzel oynayın ama rainbow gibi değil r6 daha çok öneririm
i dont have my skin i ust wanted to say can you give it to me steam
Неправдоподобно, очень токсичное комьюнити с тупыми европейцами.
Melhor FPS de todos os tempos! Só precisa melhor o sistema anti cheat.

Игра сама по себе норм, но сука как меня заебало то, что меня кикает в середине какти с надписью(ваш компьютер не может быть проверен системой VAC) и я получаю бан, комп собрал новый, установил кс, первые 3-4 катки норм, потом эта хайня, и естественно бан на 24 часа уже получен, следующий на 7 дней
Уже 20 лет играю в CS и она никогда не надоедает!
someone called me a donut in casual

Mit Freunden kann man echt ab und zu eine entspannte Runde daddeln, aber durch erhöhtes Cheater aufkommen seid Free2Play leider viele Rage Momente wenn man von einem drehenden Gegner seinen MM-Rang verliert, denn man sich erspielt hat!
